about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: Double solid yellow line markings down the center of a road indicate that passing is:

about.name: Double solid yellow line markings down the center of a road indicate that passing is:

hasPart.assesses: Double solid yellow line markings down the center of a road indicate that passing is: | Double solid yellow line markings down the center of a road indicate that passing is: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A double yellow centerline means that it is prohibited for traffic from either direction to cross the centerline to pass.

suggestedAnswer.text: Allowed only from your direction of travel.

comment.text: Allowed only from your direction of travel.

answerExplanation.text: A double yellow centerline means that it is prohibited for traffic from either direction to cross the centerline to pass.

hasPart.name: A sign with this shape means:

about.name: A sign with this shape means:

hasPart.assesses: A sign with this shape means: | A sign with this shape means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A diamond-shaped yellow sign warns of possible danger ahead. Orange signs, which are mostly diamond-shaped, are used to warn of possible dangers in or near work areas.

answerExplanation.text: A diamond-shaped yellow sign warns of possible danger ahead. Orange signs, which are mostly diamond-shaped, are used to warn of possible dangers in or near work areas.

hasPart.name: To turn left from a one-way street onto a one-way street, start from:

about.name: To turn left from a one-way street onto a one-way street, start from:

hasPart.assesses: To turn left from a one-way street onto a one-way street, start from: | To turn left from a one-way street onto a one-way street, start from: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When turning left from a one-way street onto a one-way street, start the turn from the far left lane. Watch for pedestrians, motorcyclists, and bicyclists between your vehicle and the curb because they may also legally use the left turn lane for their left turns. Turn into any lane that is safely open.

suggestedAnswer.text: The lane closest to the left curb.

comment.text: The lane closest to the left curb.

suggestedAnswer.text: Any lane, as long as it seems safe to do so.

comment.text: Any lane, as long as it seems safe to do so.

acceptedAnswer.text: The lane closest to the left curb.

comment.text: The lane closest to the left curb.

answerExplanation.text: When turning left from a one-way street onto a one-way street, start the turn from the far left lane. Watch for pedestrians, motorcyclists, and bicyclists between your vehicle and the curb because they may also legally use the left turn lane for their left turns. Turn into any lane that is safely open.

comment.text: To turn left from a one-way street onto a one-way street, start from: | When turning left from a one-way street onto a one-way street, start the turn from the far left lane. Watch for pedestrians, motorcyclists, and bicyclists between your vehicle and the curb because they may also legally use the left turn lane for their left turns. Turn into any lane that is safely open.

hasPart.name: This sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This sign means: | This sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: This sign indicates that there is a yield sign ahead. You should begin to slow down when you see this warning sign.

answerExplanation.text: This sign indicates that there is a yield sign ahead. You should begin to slow down when you see this warning sign.

comment.text: This sign means: | This sign indicates that there is a yield sign ahead. You should begin to slow down when you see this warning sign.

hasPart.name: If you drive more slowly than the flow of traffic, you will most likely:

about.name: If you drive more slowly than the flow of traffic, you will most likely:

hasPart.assesses: If you drive more slowly than the flow of traffic, you will most likely: | If you drive more slowly than the flow of traffic, you will most likely: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: You must drive more slowly than usual when there is heavy traffic or bad weather. However, if you block the normal and reasonable movement of traffic by driving too slowly, you may be cited. You should match the speed of traffic, unless the speed of traffic exceeds the legal speed limit.

suggestedAnswer.text: Interfere with traffic and receive a ticket.

comment.text: Interfere with traffic and receive a ticket.

acceptedAnswer.text: Interfere with traffic and receive a ticket.

comment.text: Interfere with traffic and receive a ticket.

answerExplanation.text: You must drive more slowly than usual when there is heavy traffic or bad weather. However, if you block the normal and reasonable movement of traffic by driving too slowly, you may be cited. You should match the speed of traffic, unless the speed of traffic exceeds the legal speed limit.

comment.text: If you drive more slowly than the flow of traffic, you will most likely: | You must drive more slowly than usual when there is heavy traffic or bad weather. However, if you block the normal and reasonable movement of traffic by driving too slowly, you may be cited. You should match the speed of traffic, unless the speed of traffic exceeds the legal speed limit.

hasPart.name: While driving, you should look 10 to 15 seconds ahead of you:

about.name: While driving, you should look 10 to 15 seconds ahead of you:

hasPart.assesses: While driving, you should look 10 to 15 seconds ahead of you: | While driving, you should look 10 to 15 seconds ahead of you: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: To avoid last-minute moves, scan the road 10 to 15 seconds ahead of your vehicle so you can see hazards early. Constantly staring at the road right in front of your vehicle is dangerous.

suggestedAnswer.text: And focus on the middle of the road.

comment.text: And focus on the middle of the road.

suggestedAnswer.text: Because it is a legal requirement.

comment.text: Because it is a legal requirement.

answerExplanation.text: To avoid last-minute moves, scan the road 10 to 15 seconds ahead of your vehicle so you can see hazards early. Constantly staring at the road right in front of your vehicle is dangerous.

comment.text: While driving, you should look 10 to 15 seconds ahead of you: | To avoid last-minute moves, scan the road 10 to 15 seconds ahead of your vehicle so you can see hazards early. Constantly staring at the road right in front of your vehicle is dangerous.
